Texts.Chs:
Having broken from the shackles of their former abusive owners, they venture space aimlessly, hoping to find a better purpose, make it a worthy equal or a purer cause.

  ^orange;食性^reset;: Omnivore, can eat raw meat

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  +^green;1920^reset; Breath Time (4 mins)
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;15^reset;% Shadow, Cosmic
  ^cyan;免疫^reset;: Slime Bounce, Slime Stick, Insanity

^orange;环境^reset;:
  Gelatinous and fleshy biomes: HPx^green;1.25^reset;
  Cold Biomes: Damage and Defence x^green;1.15^reset;
  Hot Biomes: Energy and Defence x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;武器^reset;:
  Claws/Fists: +^green;25^reset;% Movement 速度
  Bio/Slime/Living Weapons: Defence x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% E. Regen

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Fire, -^red;10^reset;% Electric
  +^red;20^reset;% Hunger Drain
Texts.Eng:
Having broken from the shackles of their former abusive owners, they venture space aimlessly, hoping to find a better purpose, make it a worthy equal or a purer cause.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, can eat raw meat

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  +^green;1920^reset; Breath Time (4 mins)
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Ice, +^green;15^reset;% Shadow, Cosmic
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Slime Bounce, Slime Stick, Insanity

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Gelatinous and fleshy biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset;
  Cold Biomes: Damage and Defence x^green;1.15^reset;
  Hot Biomes: Energy and Defence x^red;0.8^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Claws/Fists: +^green;25^reset;% Movement Speed
  Bio/Slime/Living Weapons: Defence x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% E. Regen

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;30^reset;% Fire, -^red;10^reset;% Electric
  +^red;20^reset;% Hunger Drain
